Q_DESC:
Implement stack using  an array and display the LIFO evaluation of the stack elements by performing push and pop operations on the stack elements.
INPUT:
1. first line of input must contain no. of elements in the stack
2. second line of input must contain the choice of user (i.e.) whether to push or pop element
3. if push operation has been selected as user's choice : (optional)
third line of input must contain the element to be pushed into stack
4. the next line of input must contain either Y or N as a  reply to if the user wishes to continue these operations.
